channel.title: God on Shrayas
channel.description: Recent content in God on Shrayas

item.title: Reality, perspective and God -II
item.description: Some people see him in deities. Some people see him as a spiritual being. Some people believe he was a human living among us. Me, I dont believe in religion. Don’t get me wrong. I believe in a god. I believe in a power but im not a part of those groups that separate this being into different sects demarked by religion. When we are born, inside our mothers womb .

item.title: Reality , Perspective and .. God
item.description: The title indicates something very spiritual , but trust me its not . I’m not a very spiritual guy and i don’t think i will ever be. These 3 words have meanings associated with them . But today i’m going to try and side track you away from what you know of reality , from what you know of perspectives and what you believe in of god and give you my take on them.
